grant_access_data.description: Access data object supplied in the body of the get snapshot access operation.

accesssas.description: A SAS uri for accessing a disk.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

snapshot_name.description: The name of the snapshot that is being created. The name can't be changed after the snapshot is created. Supported characters for the name are a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _. The max name length is 80 characters.
